data.title: Today In History - June 3
data.meta_description: Model Karen Elson got married to White Stripes frontman Jack White in a secret ceremony in Brazil. The shock announcement was made via White’s official websites, with a posting that read: "Karen Elson and Jack White were married yesterday on the conf
data.text:
ON this day in history...

...2005, Model Karen Elson got married to White Stripes frontman Jack White in a secret ceremony in Brazil. The shock announcement was made via White's official websites, with a posting that read: "Karen Elson and Jack White were married yesterday on the confluence of three rivers - the Rio Negro, the Solimones and the Amazon - in the Amazon basin in the city of Manaus, Brazil."

...2005, Karl Lagerfeld hosted the debut of the Dom Perignon 1998 bottle in New York, attend by Naomi Campbell, Helena Christensen and Julianne Moore. Lagerfeld stressed the importance of the tipples on offer, stating: "I don't drink much alcohol. In fact, I only like Champagne".

...2005, John Galliano failed to attend the Council of Fashion Designers of America Awards amid rumours of a botched plastic surgery procedure. The rumours were false, with his spokesperson, Elizabeth Musmanno saying: "John sustained minor injuries at home when a new glass shower door shattered. It cut him in several places, but he's doing well. He will be all dolled up and in fine form at the end of the runway at Dior's haute couture show July 6."
